SELECT `tid`, `uid`, (select uname from b_user bu where bu.uid = bt.uid ) as uname, `tname`, `people_count`, `activity_type`, (select bd.name from b_dic bd where bd.typecode='activityType' and CONVERT(bd.code USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci = bt.activity_type) as activityTypeDesc, `activity_content`, `enter_condition`, `status`, `dead_line`, `create_time`, `update_time` FROM b_team bt
and tname like concat('%',#{tdName},'%')
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bt.`uid` and bu1.uname like concat('%',#{tzName},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_dic bd where bd.typecode='activityType' and CONVERT(bd.code USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci = bt.activity_type and bd.code = #{acType})
and bt.`status` = #{aStatus}
and bt.people_count <= #{queryCount}
ORDER BY tid DESC

SELECT bt.`tid`, bt.`uid`, bt.`tname`, bt.`people_count`, bt.`activity_type`, (select bd.name from b_dic bd where bd.typecode='activityType' and CONVERT(bd.code USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci = bt.activity_type) as activityTypeDesc, bt.`activity_content`, bt.`enter_condition`, bt.`status`, bt.`dead_line` FROM b_team_entry bte left join b_team bt on bte.tid = bt.tid where bte.uid=#{uid} and bte.status = 1 order by bte.create_time desc

SELECT bt.`tid`, bt.`uid`, bt.`tname`, bt.`people_count`, bt.`activity_type`, (select bd.name from b_dic bd where bd.typecode='activityType' and CONVERT(bd.code USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci = bt.activity_type) as activityTypeDesc, bt.`activity_content`, bt.`enter_condition`, bt.`status`, bt.`dead_line` FROM b_team bt where bt.uid=#{uid} order by bt.create_time desc
SELECT count(*) FROM b_team bt where bt.uid=#{uid} and date_format(create_time, '%Y%m') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m')

SELECT `tid`, `uid`, `tname`, (select bd.name from b_dic bd where bd.typecode='activityType' and CONVERT(bd.code USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci = bt.activity_type) as activityTypeDesc, `people_count`, `activity_type`, `activity_content`, `enter_condition`, `status`, `dead_line`, `create_time`, `update_time` FROM b_team bt WHERE tid = #{tid}
